info.title: Marketplace API
info.description: Use this API to manage product data.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all brands, with optional filtering by keyword

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: A keyword to filter brands by their name

post.description: Create a new brand with name, address, and email

get.description: Retrieve a specific brand by its ID

put.description: Update the name, address, and/or email of a specific brand by its ID

delete.description: Delete a specific brand by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories

post.description: Create a new category with a name and optional description

get.description: Retrieve a specific category by its ID

put.description: Update the name and/or description of a specific category by its ID

delete.description: Delete a specific category by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of deliveries. You can search by order_type, extra_protection, or shipping_price.

post.description: Create a new delivery with the specified details.

get.description: Retrieve a single delivery by its ID.

put.description: Update the details of an existing delivery by its ID.

delete.description: Delete an existing delivery by its ID.

get.description: Returns a list of payments, optionally filtered by a keyword.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for filtering payments by method

get.description: Returns a specific payment by ID.

delete.description: Deletes a payment record by ID.

get.summary: Display a listing of the resource.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to delete

post.description: Authenticate a user using their email and password
Create a new user account with name, email, and password
Revoke the token of the authenticated user

get.summary: Get a specific voucher by ID

put.summary: Update a specific voucher by ID

delete.summary: Delete a specific voucher by ID

bearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format **Bearer <token>**
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
